name: Invertion Car!
description:
Invertion Car!

In this game you can invert gravity also you have to make your way from the spikes

if you run into a spike you die

Controls:

space: Gravity up

shift: Gravity down

Theme: Invertion

this game was made for a game jam

please tell how you felt while playing this game

Game made by: Wisdev

How to download:

extract the file that you have downloaded then choose the operating system that you are on
